title: LUX BUFF
body: lux deserves a buff shes such a fun champ and has gotten so weak in the recent patches

replies.body: Shes a support class. Her ult is pretty good. She has stun and slow abilities. She's not meant to do a 1v1.

i mean like yeah shes already good but she has like zero mobility which gives here a really iffy early game. if anything re work her W because if youre up against any decent midlaner they know to just use the mobility against you and then you wont snowball in time
